abstract.text: Use the appropriate payload for your configuration needs.

inlineContent.text: In addition to the standard payload keys (described in
) each payload can contain keys specific to a payload type. These payload specific keys are described in detail, below.
For profiles that use paths, consider them to be case sensitive.

abstract.text: The payload you use to configure macOS App Store restrictions.

The payload you use to configure login behavior.

The payload you use to configure the default fallback global Ethernet interface.
